page.title: 11TYPICAL BAYSTON HILL FRIDAY
page.content: I wake up between 7.00 each morning .As soon as my alarm goes off I bolt into the bathroom. After a quick wash I go downstairs and eat my breakfast before my sister Emma comes.My mum comes down at 8.30.A friend calls for me to walk to school .On the way we munch our lunchtime biscuits.We wait outside the gate until a teacher comes out and signals us to enter.Then we go on the playground until its time to go into school.In the morning we have maths. Then after a shortish break "English". At lunch I eat my sandwiches and after lunch we have my favourite lesson "Art".After a break we have games. After school I watch T.V before I have my tea.After that I go out and play with my friends.I go to bed at 9.30pm.
